sentences.en: ...the government's tendency to secrecy in recent years.
sentences.cn: …近年来政府的保密倾向。

sentences.en: a tendency among Americans to get married at a later age
sentences.cn: 美国人晚婚的趋势

sentences.en: children with aggressive or anti-social tendencies
sentences.cn: 具有攻击性倾向或反社会倾向的儿童

sentences.en: He has a tendency to forget things.
sentences.cn: 他有忘事的倾向.

sentences.en: He has a tendency to oversell himself.
sentences.cn: 他爱自我吹嘘。

sentences.en: He has a tendency towards pretentiousness.
sentences.cn: 他总是想表现得自命不凡。

sentences.en: He is spoiled, arrogant and has a tendency towards snobbery.
sentences.cn: 他被宠坏了，傲慢无礼，而且经常自命不凡。

sentences.en: Parks has a tendency to become personally involved with his photographic subjects.
sentences.cn: 帕克斯往往会跟他的拍摄对象产生感情纠葛。

sentences.en: Prices continue to show an upward tendency.
sentences.cn: 物价呈继续上升的趋势.

sentences.en: Prices have an upward tendency.
sentences.cn: 价格有上升的趋势.

sentences.en: Stewart has developed a tendency to mix it verbally with the opposition.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特现在变得只要和别人意见不合，就准备大吵一架。

sentences.en: Substances have no tendency to expand unless ( they are ) heated.
sentences.cn: 除非 受热,物质不会有膨胀的倾向.

sentences.en: Such a tendency is not to be encouraged.
sentences.cn: 此风不可长.

sentences.en: The tendency still persists.
sentences.cn: 这种倾向一直存在.

sentences.en: the tendency to see old people as asexual
sentences.cn: 认为老年人性缺乏的倾向

sentences.en: The tendency towards masochism is however always linked with elements of sadism.
sentences.cn: 不过，性受虐狂的倾向中总是有一些施虐的成分。

sentences.en: There is a tendency to externalize all religions.
sentences.cn: 存在把一切宗教都视为仅具外表形式的倾向。

sentences.en: There was an upward tendency in oil shares yesterday.
sentences.cn: 石油股票昨天有上涨的势头.

sentences.en: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
sentences.cn: 他们爱炫耀，几乎对每种情况都添油加醋。

sentences.en: We have a tendency to think that everything is about us.
sentences.cn: 我们有一种倾向，认为任何事都要围着我们转。

sentences.en: When you think of a “life without limits” you have a tendency to think that you can do anything.
sentences.cn: 当你思考“生命没有限制”的时候，你会有一种倾向，觉得自己能做任何事情。

words.tran_cn: 宣传性的；有支持某种立场的倾向
有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的

trans.tran_cn: 倾向，趋势，偏好，极端势力
trans.tran_en: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it
